biotools.summary: Repository, in a prototype stage, of mass spectra of small chemical compounds for life science (<2000 Da). The database will contain MSn data acquired on different platforms by different research groups. MSn data will be annotated with chemical information about the fragments.

bioschemas.name: MetiTree
bioschemas.summary: Repository, in a prototype stage, of mass spectra of small chemical compounds for life science (<2000 Da). The database will contain MSn data acquired on different platforms by different research groups. MSn data will be annotated with chemical information about the fragments.
